Build

Build with support for lzfse compression and capstone ARM64 disassembly

Dependancies:

  • lzfse
  • capstone

Install the dependancies

Via homebrew

$ brew install lzfse
$ brew install capstone --HEAD

From source

  • lzfse
$ git clone https://github.com/lzfse/lzfse.git
$ cd lzfse
$ mkdir build
$ cd build
$ cmake ..
$ make install
  • capstone
$ git clone -b next https://github.com/aquynh/capstone.git
$ cd capstone
$ CAPSTONE_ARCHS="arm aarch64 x86" ./make.sh
$ sudo ./make.sh install

Install the Go binary

$ CGO_ENABLED=1 \
  CGO_CFLAGS=-I/usr/local/include \ # path to the lzfse and capstone includes
  CGO_LDFLAGS=-L/usr/local/lib \    # path to the lzfse and capstone libs
  go build ./cmd/ipsw

Build WITHOUT support for lzfse compression and capstone ARM64 disassembly

Install the Go binary

$ CGO_ENABLED=0 go build ./cmd/ipsw
